languages.text: "То есть для тебя смертн{mf|ый|ая} встал{mf||а} превыше братьев? Ты одичал и оглупел, Пропащий!"
"So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"
languages.original_text: "То есть для тебя смертн{mf|ый|ая} встал{mf||а} превыше братьев? Ты одичал и оглупел, Пропащий!"

traits.locale_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"
"So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"
"So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"
"So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

languages.text: “你认为这个凡人比你的兄弟更重要，是吗？迷途之人啊，你失去了狼群的陪伴，变得既狂妄、又愚蠢！”
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: “你认为这个凡人比你的兄弟更重要，是吗？迷途之人啊，你失去了狼群的陪伴，变得既狂妄、又愚蠢！”

languages.text: 「つまりこの人間は、お前の同胞より大切ということか？群れを離れてるうちに、バカな野良狼になったか、エバーロスト！」
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: 「つまりこの人間は、お前の同胞より大切ということか？群れを離れてるうちに、バカな野良狼になったか、エバーロスト！」

languages.text: «O sea, ¿que favoreces a este mortal antes que a tus hermanos? ¡Tanto tiempo sin la manada te ha vuelto un salvaje incompetente, Perdido!».
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: «O sea, ¿que favoreces a este mortal antes que a tus hermanos? ¡Tanto tiempo sin la manada te ha vuelto un salvaje incompetente, Perdido!».

languages.text: « Tu fais donc passer {mf|ce mortel|cette mortelle} avant tes frères ? L'absence de ta meute t'a rendu sauvage et stupide, Égaré ! »
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: « Tu fais donc passer {mf|ce mortel|cette mortelle} avant tes frères ? L'absence de ta meute t'a rendu sauvage et stupide, Égaré ! »

languages.text: "Dann stellt Ihr {mf|diesen Sterblichen|diese Sterbliche} also über Eure Brüder? Der Verlust Eures Rudels hat Euch barbarisch und dumm gemacht, Siegtnie!"
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann stellt Ihr {mf|diesen Sterblichen|diese Sterbliche} also über Eure Brüder? Der Verlust Eures Rudels hat Euch barbarisch und dumm gemacht, Siegtnie!"

languages.text: "Bu fâniyi kardeşlerinden daha mı değerli görüyorsun? Sürüsüz gezmek seni vahşileştirmiş ve aptallaştırmış Hepgaip!"
languages.original_text: "So you hold this mortal above your brothers? Being without a pack has turned you feral and stupid, Everlost!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu fâniyi kardeşlerinden daha mı değerli görüyorsun? Sürüsüz gezmek seni vahşileştirmiş ve aptallaştırmış Hepgaip!"
